# Objective

The objective of this exercise is to critique and improve an **Age-Sex Pyramid Analytic Visualization** of Singapore of the year 2022. The output is to recreate a Trellis Chart Age-Sex Pyramid through R-Studios.

The visualization is created using the ***Singapore Residents by Planning Area / Sub-zone, Age Group, Sex and Type of Dwelling, June 2022 (Singstat).***
